post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
I am very thankful to all the people came last Friday for soft skills seminar. It was great experience and practice. I have learned a lot during preparation. Usually presenter becomes the most benefit from the seminar. I thank everyone that gave the chance to present the materials.
I have little bits of regret too. Because I tried to cover as much as possible in given time. I felt like that I only covered the surface of all the fields but the same time wasn't enough. Maybe I mislead due lack of information.
Anyway it was good start. If I get the other chances, I like to discuss about "Leadership". Probably leadership is the most difficult to acquire among all soft skills. Because it asks "WHY". Other soft skills need "HOW"
Thanks again and until next time.
post.title: Epilogue
